fr.liglab.icasa.self.star.temperature.management.exercice.four.moment.of.the.day

Interface MomentOfTheDayListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TemperatureManagerAdministrationImpl

    public interface MomentOfTheDayListener
    The listener interface for receiving momentOfTheDay events. The class that is interested in processing a momentOfTheDay event implements this interface, and the object created with that class is registered with a component using the MomentOfTheDayService register method. When the momentOfTheDay event occurs, that object's appropriate method (momentOfTheDayHasChanged) is invoked. When the listener is leaving, it must unregister.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void momentOfTheDayHasChanged(MomentOfTheDay newMomentOfTheDay)
      Notify the listener that moment of the day has changed.

    • Method Detail

      • momentOfTheDayHasChanged

        void momentOfTheDayHasChanged(MomentOfTheDay newMomentOfTheDay)
        Notify the listener that moment of the day has changed.
        Parameters:
        newMomentOfTheDay - the new moment of the day
